description: Synthetic CAPTCHA images for training CTC-based recognition models with variable-length support (3-7 characters). Dataset stored as raw images only - preprocessing done on-the-fly.

font_test.description: Test dataset using custom fonts from train_font_library/

preprocessing.description: Applied on-the-fly during training and evaluation (no stored processed images)
steps: Morphological closing (3x3 ellipse kernel) for noise removal

font_library.description: Custom fonts for generating diverse CAPTCHA test sets
font_library.instructions: Download fonts from Google Drive and place in train_font_library/ directory to use font test features

note: All datasets and images are gitignored to keep repository lightweight. Use regeneration commands to create locally.
